#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
   unsigned long long int a,b;
   int res,p[10],q[10],i,j,k,sum,x,c;
   while(cin>>a>>b)
   {
       if(a==0&&b==0)
        return 0;
       else
       {
           cout<<endl;
           res=0;
           for(i=0;i<10;i++)
           {
               p[i]=0;
               q[i]=0;
           }
           i=0;
           while(a>0)
           {
               p[i]=a%10;
               a=a/10;
               i++;
           }
           j=i;
           i=0;
           while(b>0)
           {
               q[i]=b%10;
               b=b/10;
               i++;
           }
           k=i;
           c=0;
           for(x=0;x<10;x++)
           {
               sum=(p[x]+q[x]+c);
               if(sum>=10)
               {
                   res=res+1;
                   c=1;
               }
               else
                c=0;
           }
           if(res==0)
            {
                cout<<"No carry operation.";
                cout<<endl<<endl;
            }
           else if(res==1)
            {
                cout<<"1 carry operation.";
                cout<<endl<<endl;
            }
           else
            {
                cout<<res<<" carry operations.";
                cout<<endl<<endl;
            }
       }
   }
   return 0;
}
